function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate consideration for the use and maintenance of communal areas may lead to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Poor urban emerging problems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey examines advantages and disadvantages of living in apartments and houses during the pandemic, potentially uncovering environmental factors that contribute to disease spread.","category":"Inadequate residential space for pandemic scenarios","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate lighting and ventilation in residential pandemic scenarios","category":"Inadequate adoption of health-focused building standards","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination among different levels of public planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration and integration in smart city environments","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unpreparedness
